links.title: Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway bought stunning 75 million Apple shares in first quarter
links.description: Wall Street may have had doubts about Apple before the company reported its most recent quarterly earnings, but one of the tech company's biggest shareholders - Warren Buffett - didn't. In the first quarter, Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway bought an astounding 75 million shares of Apple.
